mapper.insert: insert into daily select cycle.cid, cycle.pid, cal.dt, cycle.cnt from cycle, (select to_char(to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyyMM') + (level-1), 'yyyyMMdd') dt, to_char(to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyyMM') + (level-1), 'd') day from dual connect by level <= last_day(to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyyMM')) - to_date(#{ym}, 'yyyyMM')+1) cal where cycle.day = cal.day order by cycle.cid, cycle.pid, cal.dt

select seq_batch.nextval bid from dual
insert into batch values (#{bid}, #{bcd}, #{st}, sysdate, null)
